primaryIdentifier.description: Which of the following types of IDs has been determined to be the primary ID of the product. The primary ID is used in the rest of the standard to identify the product uniquely.

apirCode.title: Product APIR Code
apirCode.description: The product’s APIR code. Must include if available.

listingExchange.description: Code of exchange the product is listed on, using ISO Market Identifier Code (MIC). Must include if product is listed.  If a product is listed in Australia and another country, prefer the Australian listing.

exchangeCode.description: The product’s exchange code (for listed products). Must include if “listing exchange” is completed.

isinCode.title: ISIN
isinCode.description: The product’s ISIN code. Must include if available.

usi.description: For super funds: 9 digit APIR code or 14 digit numeric code.

issuerCode.description: Issuer determined product code – should be the type of last resort.  Don’t reuse industry wide codes in this field.  (platforms, insurance products).

name.title: Product Name
name.description: Financial instrument (Product) name. Note name is subject to change over time – not for machine analysis.

arsn.title: ARSN
arsn.description: Product ARSN. Must include if available.  Do not use this field as primary product identifier.

version.title: Version Number
version.description: Version number of the TMD. Can be non-integer. Major versions increment by 1. Minor changes (backwards compatible) increment by less than 1.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the TMD which indicates whether it should be distributed. A status of under review, unavailable or closed will be a signal to distributor to stop retail distribution (unless the distribution is excluded dealing).

dateApproved.title: Date Approved
dateApproved.description: Date that this TMD version was approved.

mandatoryReviewDate.title: Mandatory Review Date
mandatoryReviewDate.description: Next mandatory review date for this TMD version. A review can occur before this date.

name.title: Name
name.description: Contact details for this record - name.

title.title: Title
title.description: Contact position title (eg Senior Product Manager; Compliance Manager).

description.title: 1.1. Investment Objective Description - product description including key attributes
description.description: A description of the investment objective of the product, including growth/defensive split.

capitalGrowth.title: 1.2. Capital Growth
capitalGrowth.description: Do the product investment objectives align with those of an investor seeking Capital Growth.

capitalPreservation.title: 1.3. Capital Preservation
capitalPreservation.description: Do the product investment objectives align with those of an investor seeking Capital Preservation.

capitalGuaranteed.title: 1.4. Capital Guaranteed
capitalGuaranteed.description: Do the product investment objectives align with those of an investor seeking Capital Guaranteed.

regularIncome.title: 1.5. Regular Income
regularIncome.description: Do the product investment objectives align with those of an investor seeking Regular Income?

description.title: 2.1. Product Use Description - product description including key attributes
description.description: A description of the investment objective of the product, including asset allocation and diversification information.

solutionStandalone.title: 2.2. Solution / Standalone (75% - 100%)
solutionStandalone.description: Is the product intended to be used as a Solution / Standalone product.

coreComponent.title: 2.3. Core Component (25% -75%)
coreComponent.description: Is the product intended to be used as a core component product.

satellite.title: 2.4. Satellite (0% - 25%)
satellite.description: Is the product intended to be used as a satellite product.

description.title: 3.1. Investment Timeframe Description - product description including key attributes
description.description: A description of the minimum suggested timeframe for holding the product.

short.title: 3.2. Short (< 2 years)
short.description: Is it appropriate for investors to hold the product for 0-2 years before selling.

medium.title: 3.3. Medium (2 - 6 years)
medium.description: Is it appropriate for investors to hold the product for 2-6 years before selling.

long.title: 3.4. Long (> 6 years)
long.description: Is it appropriate for investors to hold the product for more than 6 years before selling.

description.title: 4.1. Risk and Return description - product description including key attributes
description.description: A description of the product risk and return metrics, include risk band and the return hurdle rate.

veryHigh.title: 4.2. Very High
veryHigh.description: Does the product have very high risk and return attributes.

high.title: 4.3. High
high.description: Does the product have high risk and return attributes.

medium.title: 4.4. Medium
medium.description: Does the product have medium risk and return attributes.

low.title: 4.5. Low
low.description: Does the product have low risk and return attributes.

capitalGuaranteed.title: 4.6. Capital Guaranteed
capitalGuaranteed.description: Does the product have capital guaranteed attributes.

consumersRiskAndReturnProfile.title: 4. Consumer’s Risk (ability to bear loss) and Return Profile

description.title: 5.1. Need to withdraw money description - product description including key attributes
description.description: A description of the intended frequency and mechanism for which investors redeem interests in the product.

daily.title: 5.2. Daily
daily.description: Product suitable for investors that redeem interests daily.

weekly.title: 5.3. Weekly
weekly.description: Product suitable for investors that redeem interests weekly.

monthly.title: 5.4. Monthly
monthly.description: Product suitable for investors that redeem interests weekly.

quaterly.title: 5.5. Quarterly
quaterly.description: Product suitable for investors that redeem interests quarterly.

annuallyOrLonger.title: 5.6. Annually or Longer
annuallyOrLonger.description: Product suitable for investors that redeem interests annually or longer.

noDistributionConditions.title: No distribution conditions
noDistributionConditions.description: Confirm if there are no distribution conditions.

personalAdviceDistributionOnly1.title: Personal advice distribution only (1)
personalAdviceDistributionOnly1.description: Only suitable for distribution to consumers who have received personal advice – Confirm.

personalAdviceDistributionOnly2.title: Personal advice distribution only (2)
personalAdviceDistributionOnly2.description: Only suitable for distribution to consumers who have received personal advice – set out rationale.

specifiedDistributorsOrChannelsOnly1.title: Specified distributors/channels only (1)
specifiedDistributorsOrChannelsOnly1.description: Only suitable for distribution through specified distributors / specified channels - Confirm

specifiedDistributorsOrChannelsOnly2.title: Specified distributors/channels only (2)
specifiedDistributorsOrChannelsOnly2.description: Only suitable for distribution through specified distributors / specified channels - Specify.

specifiedDistributorsOrChannelsOnly3.title: Specified distributors/channels only (3)
specifiedDistributorsOrChannelsOnly3.description: Only suitable for distribution through specified distributors / specified channels – set out rationale.

otherDistributionConditions1.title: Other distribution conditions (1)
otherDistributionConditions1.description: Are there any other distribution conditions (ie sale via use of call script only).

otherDistributionConditions2.title: Other distribution conditions (2)
otherDistributionConditions2.description: Specify and describe any other distribution conditions.

reviewTigger.description: List one trigger per subrecord. As distributors don’t need to action review triggers, there is no need for standardisation/validation of the text.

description.title: How to send reports?
description.description: URL link to instructions (must be permanent link).

acquisitionOutsideTM.title: Acquisition outside TM
acquisitionOutsideTM.description: Does issuer require reporting on transactions outside TMD that the Distributor is aware of?

FSCDataStandardForTransactions.title: FSC data standard for transactions?
FSCDataStandardForTransactions.description: Should report follow FSC DDO data standard for transactions?

alternativeDataStandard.title: Link to alternative data standard if used

frequencyOfReport.title: Frequency of Report
frequencyOfReport.description: Required frequency of report by distributors on dealings outside target market.

FSCDataStandardForComplaints.title: FSC data standard for complaints?
FSCDataStandardForComplaints.description: Is complaints reporting required to use FSC complaints standard?

appropriateness.title: Appropriateness
appropriateness.description: Explanation how issuer considers TMD performs against appropriateness test as required by ASIC RG.

versionOfStandard.title: Version of standard
versionOfStandard.description: Version number of data standard. Can be non-integer. Major versions should increment by 1. Minor changes (backwards compatible) can increment by less than 1. (eg 2.1, 2.2, 2.3).

dateSent.title: Date Sent
dateSent.description: Date that this report was sent.
